root: ^???: Hello? Tusk told me to come down here. I'm the guy. He told you about the guy, right? He told you about me?

MED: ^Greg: Hey, lower your voice, okay? Not trying to blow our cover here or anything, I'm basically on my lunch break. I don't want to get the feds called down here. Let's just play it cool.
Name: ^???: I have a name, but do you really think it's smart to be announcing it to the whole street? I'm not here on strictly above-board business. Ugh, okay look it's G-R-E-G, okay?
